name: A New Day Theme
description:
A New Day is a Big Cartel template that will give your shop a stylish new look with lots of features. Features include a homepage slideshow for landscape images, large product photo display, background image support, product catalog images allow mouseover effect, advanced SEO support and custom page templates for common shop content.

Key Features

  • Homepage Slideshow
  • Large product images
  • Product Image Mouseover Effect
  • New Arrivals & On Sale Product templates
  • About & FAQ: Custom templates
  • Privacy Policy & Terms: Custom templates
  • SEO optimizations built-in
  • 4 products across
  • Related products on Product page
  • Social Sharing on Product page
  • Product thumbs on Product page
  • Product thumbnail preview in Shopping Cart

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a logo with a width of 890px for best fit
  • Upload a repeating background image
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Edit the menu using the Layout template

Installation & Setup

  • Always backup your current theme
  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Edit HTML templates to include your social network links.
  • Make sure to add special custom templates
  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.
anewday

name: End of Summer
description:
End of Summer is a Big Cartel theme will bring a trendy updated look to your shop with lots of features. Features include a homepage slideshow for landscape images, large product photos, css for black or white background and custom page templates for common shop content.

Shipped with 6 special page templates perfect to help you build out an entire shop with New product, On Sale, About, FAQ, Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages. Just follow the directions and you will have a full site in no time.

  • Includes CSS for white or black background

  • Upload a logo with a width of 450px for best fit

  • Edit the menu using the Layout template

Installation & Setup

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout file

  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.
endofsummer

name: The Label
description:
The Label is a Big Cartel theme with a clean designer look for your shop. With the option to use the single image upload of a logo/banner on Big Cartel to display a large image on the homepage and use text for the store name on the sidebar. The big feature of this theme is the support for nested subcategories. Just name your categories in the proper format and get automatically nested categories up to one level deep.

Use the demo link to the right with your Big Cartel Id to see the theme in action. The demo does not show nested categories but see the image below.

Key Features

  • Homepage banner image
  • Nested Category Support
  • 4 products across
  • Sharing integration on Product page
  • Pinterest Pin button
  • Product thumbs on Product page
  • Product thumbnails on Cart
  • Canonical Url support

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a banner with a width of 740px
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Edit the menus using the Layout template

Installation & Setup

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout file
  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.

Nested Category Display

images provided by http://hellotenfold.bigcartel.com/

thelabel

name: Sunday Drive Slideshow
description:
Sunday Drive Slideshow the theme everyone wants at a great price. Features include a homepage slider for your lifestyle images and placeholders for your graphic buttons on the homepage.

Key Features

  • Homepage: Large Slideshow
  • Homepage: Large button for links
  • Artists links on product page.
  • 4 images across
  • Sharing integration on Product page
  • Large 960 pixel width
  • Multiple product thumbs on Product page
  • Product thumbnail preview in Cart
  • Artists and category sidebar
  • Displays shipping prices where available
  • Easily add social media links in footer
  • Canonical URLs for better SEO

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a logo with a width of 960px
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Enable Best Selling & Latest Products
  • Turn on/off Search, Inventory Bars, Artist Labels to view how the theme adjusts

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout
  • Use css editor to change theme colors

sundaydriveslideshow

name: Bringing Sexy Back
description:
We are Bringing Sexy Back by giving the default Big Cartel theme, Sexy, an update it has needed for a long time. A theme with lots of built in features and function.

The default out of the box theme on Big Cartel is Sexy. This theme is used by many of the 100,000+ shops on Big Cartel. This theme has seen it's day and people should have more choices. So we want to offer to you the updated and revised version we call, 'Bringing Sexy Back' that includes a slideshow.

The theme takes many of the basic requests for customization and integrates them right into the theme and offers several variable settings to show or hide features. All described in the README file with the theme download.

Key Features

  • Homepage slider in place for images sized at 716x350pixels by default.
  • A new view at your top-selling, newest and on-sale products on the home page with thumbnails.
  • Theme Settings for easily adding your Twitter, Pinterest and Facebook links as social icons.
  • An easy to use Theme Setting to move the sidebar from the right side to the left side.
  • The Simple Color Editor still works with this theme.
  • 4 products per row instead of 3.
  • Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and Google share buttons built in on each product page.
  • Product thumbnails on individual product pages.
  • Artist and Category links on each product page.
  • Next and Previous product navigation.
  • 917 pixel width page great for a nice wide banner
  • Canonical urls for better seo

Theme Tips

  • Banner/Logo up to 917 pixels wide.
  • Use 3rd party site for slideshow images like tinypic.
  • The Slider is found within the HOME template.
  • Custom settings in LAYOUT template.
  • Enable Best Selling & Latest Products
  • Use the same image ratio for all products

Installation & Setup

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout file
  • Use Big Cartel css editor to select theme colors
  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.
bringingsexyback

name: Jefferson
description:
Jefferson is the perfect introduction to what custom themes on Big Cartel are all about. It is nearly a free big cartel theme.

The default Sexy theme receives product thumbnail display on the detailed pages and cart page. Google, Twitter and Facebook share buttons integrated into the product pages. And what many people want is 4 products across. Set up your site today at a minimal cost and still be able to use the same color schemes as you had been originally but now you can use a larger banner, up to 936 pixels wide!

Key Theme Features

  • 4 products per row
  • 936 pixel wide page design.
  • Multiple product thumbs on Product page
  • Product thumbnail preview in Shopping Cart
  • Sharing integration on Product page
  • based on Sexy Theme, makes for an easy upgrade

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a logo with a width of 936px
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Enable Best Selling & Latest Products
  • Turn on/off Search, Inventory Bars, Artist Labels to view how the theme adjusts
  • Edit the menus using the Layout template

Installation & Setup

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout file
  • Use Big Cartel css editor to change theme colors
  • Always backup before making changes
  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.
jefferson

name: Big Cartel Domain Setup
description:
Custom Domain Setup Service for Big Cartel

Big Cartel provides a simple feature to allow your Big Cartel hosted shop to be viewed at your own custom domain. The instructions are provided by Big Cartel on how to do this but sometimes you don't have the time or experience to get this done. So we thought we would try offering you a simple service to setup your custom domain for you so that you can see http://themes.tonkapark.com instead of http://tonkapark.bigcartel.com in your browser url. There are basically two options:

Option 1: Root Level Custom Domain

I want http://domain.com to be my Big Cartel shop and I do not use email at this domain name. With this setup your shop pages will be at www.domain.com or just domain.com. You will not be able to access any existing files or emails at the root level domain.

Option 2: Subdomain Setup

I want http://shop.domain.com to be my Big Cartel shop but I use it for other hosting and email. Choose this option if you are already hosting a blog or other files at the main domain. Also if you are using email at the root domain setting up a subdomain like shop or store.domain.com will be a great solution.

What's Included?

We will setup the DNS entries and Big Cartel settings necessary to make this all work. The price does not include domain registration or hosting.

Where should I register a domain name?

There are so many places to register but we have had a good experience with 1&1 Internet, Inc.. They also do hosting.

Do I need hosting

Hosting is not required for using a custom domain unless you need a place for additional files, a self hosted blog, other content pages or email services. Our choice for hosting when you are just starting out is Dreamhost. If you do need hosting signup with code TONKAPARK25 for 25% off your first year of hosting. You typically even get a free domain registration with the hosting signup.

The Process

After your purchase please allow up to 2 business days for response to schedule time to setup your domain. Typically it will be faster than that. We are in the Central Timezone in the United States so keep that in mind as well. We will need your registrar account credentials to access to setup your DNS entry as well as the login to your Big Cartel account. Shouldn't take more than 24 hours once we begin changes for your site to be active at the custom domain. Ask us questions some links might be affiliate links

name: Big Cartel Theme Install and Setup
description:
About the Setup Package

This is our basic theme setup offering. This may not be suitable for all shops, but we are more than happy to provide custom quotes for you.

What's Included

We will install any of our themes on your Big Cartel account. Make minor customizations to menus, home page layout and colors. Use client provided images for the home page or slideshow layouts hosted on an existing blog, ftp site, photobucket or similar image host.

Customizations

Customizations can be menu changes, hard code nesting into category lists, add horizontal or vertical navigation, move links, add links, setup custom home page layout using provided images, slideshow on the home page and color tweaks.

Final details

After your purchase we will contact you for your Big Cartel login details, final customization requests and location of your images to be used throughout the site. Have further questions please contact us.

name: Big Cartel Theme Installation
description:
Basic theme installation for one of our Big Cartel themes. Installation does not include changes or customization to the theme.

If we do not contact you please reach out with your order number using our contact form http://tonkapark.com/contact

name: New Beginnings Envy

new-beginnings

name: Thursday
description: Our first Storenvy theme has been discontinued. Please consider our better designed New Beginnings Storenvy theme and be on the watch for more Storenvy themes from Tonka Park.
